snippet: Suspected Boko Haram militants, who arrived on motorcycles throwing bombs, raided a mostly Christian town in Nigeria's northeast after nightfall on Saturday, residents and a military source said....

headline.print_headline: Suspected Boko Haram Militants Raid Northern Christian Town in Nigeria
headline.main: Suspected Boko Haram Militants Raid Northern Christian Town in Nigeria

lead_paragraph: Suspected Boko Haram militants, who arrived on motorcycles throwing bombs, raided a mostly Christian town in Nigeria's northeast after nightfall on Saturday, residents and a military source said.
